title: Tom Brady's Snake Oil
description:
Besides being a king of football and all around touchdown master, did you know Tom Brady endorses a training and nutrition regimen co-created by a guy who got in trouble with the FTC for selling fake cancer pills? Let's talk about TB12.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
